name: Shanghai Private Tour To Famous Ancient Water Town Villages
description:
Professional and reliable Personal English guide /Private tour guide and peraonal Local guide to show you the real beauty of the thousand year old water village  Tongli.
Located along the Famous Tailake , east end of Grand canal , with four sides facing water , eight sides surrounded by water ( Tongli, Jiuli, Chenghu, Bozhuang, Baiyan, Yeze, Nanxin, Pangshan lakes). It is regarded as the " little Oriental Venice". After merged with Twen cun town in 2001 , The total area of Tongli is around 102 square Km , with about 6 0, 000population. Tongli features as the typical Ming and Qing dynasty archituures, it is a well preserved water township with a history of more than 1, 000 years. Tuisi garden has been listed in the World heritage list in 2001. It is also a place popular with film shoots and directions.
